scripts.prebuild: npm run check-engines && npm run check-licenses
scripts.build: wp-scripts build && node build-scripts/less && node build-scripts/metadata && node build-scripts/wp-assets && node build-scripts/copy
scripts.build:dev: wp-scripts build --mode development && node build-scripts/less && node build-scripts/metadata && node build-scripts/wp-assets && node build-scripts/copy
scripts.lint: npm run lint:pkg-json && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:md-docs
scripts.lint:php: wp-env run --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/uikit-blocks' cli composer run-script lint
scripts.make-pot: wp-env run --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/uikit-blocks' cli wp i18n make-pot ./ languages/uikit-blocks.pot -- --exclude=.github,build-scripts,dist,stubs,test-themes
